enchantment.uniqueapex.aeons_fragment.de: Throwing a Trident will accelerate time around the area of impact. Trident has to be stationary to keep effect active
enchantment.uniqueapex.blessed_blade.des: Increases Attack Damage and deals additional Magic Damage
enchantment.uniqueapex.gaias_fragment.de: Shift-rightclick both locations, can destroy all blocks in range
enchantment.uniqueapex.second_life.desc: If an Item reaches 1 Durability it'll restore a part of it's durability. Every restore reduces this Enchantment Level by 1
unique.apex.desc:
Catalysts go into side chests.
Enchantments go into the top.
Output is the first slot in the top chest
